Post: "I'm so angry that my friend borrowed my car without even asking! I guess I'm just not important enough to respect other people's property."
"I got caught in the downpour because I'm always unprepared and never plan ahead."

Event: My mom forced me to leave against my will.
Post: "I can't believe my own mom would do this to me. She forced me to leave against my will. I guess I'm just not good enough for her. 😔 #sad#rejected#unloved"
"I was attacked because I'm too weak and vulnerable. I always knew I was a target waiting to happen."
"Missing my cousin like crazy today. I guess it's just my natural tendency to be terrible at maintaining relationships and losing the people I care about most."
"My boy died because I'm a failure as a parent. I didn't deserve to have him in the first place."

Event: Nothing to do today besides work.
Post: "Feeling stuck and unfulfilled in my job. I guess I'm just not cut out for this career path. #failure #disappointment"
"Feeling sad and hopeless lately because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: My glands in my neck hurt too much.
Post: "Feeling like a total failure today. My glands in my neck are killing me and I can't seem to shake off this fatigue. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."
"Feeling so ashamed and unworthy after being publicly rejected by my crush. I guess I'm just not cut out for love. 💔 #rejectionhurt #notgoodenough"

"I received a negative performance review from my boss, and I'm starting to think that it's because I'm just not cut out for this job. Maybe I'm not smart enough or capable enough to succeed in this field."

"I'm so devastated to find my beloved pet fish dead. I feel like a failure as a pet owner. Maybe I didn't feed them enough or clean their tank often enough. I'll never be able to forgive myself for this."
"I'm bored because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I'm getting sore feet from all the walking I've been doing lately. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

"I'm so embarrassing, always making a fool of myself in front of others. It's like I have no filter and can't stop myself from saying the most awkward things. 🙈 Maybe it's just my nervous personality or maybe I'm just not cut out for social situations. #embarrassing #selfconscious #awkward"

Event: Graduation being the worst day ever.
Post: "Graduation day was a total disaster. I mean, who gets kicked out of their own family on the same day they're supposed to be celebrating their academic achievements? It figures, though. I'm just cursed, I guess."
"I'm such a failure. I can't even keep a job for more than a few months. It's like I'm allergic to success or something. 🤦‍♀️ #failure #notgoodenough"

Event: Trending topics on Twitter became useless.
Post: "I can't believe I wasted so much time trying to keep up with trending topics on Twitter, but it's just not worth it anymore. My interests and passions are clearly not in line with what's popular, and that's okay. I'm done forcing myself to fit into a mold that doesn't suit me. #embracingmydifferences #movingonfromtrendingtopics"

Event: I had to undergo arthroscopy to repair my knee.
Post: "I'm not surprised I needed arthroscopy to fix my knee; after all, I've always been a bit accident-prone and have worn down my joints over the years from playing sports."

"I'm not surprised my classmates called me retarded. I've always felt like there's something wrong with me, like I'm just not good enough. Maybe it's because of my learning disability or maybe it's just because I'm a failure in general. Either way, it's clear that I don't belong here."

Note: This post is an example of internal attributional style because it attributes the cause of the event (being called retarded) to the individual's own personal shortcomings or failures, rather than to external factors such as bullying or discrimination.

Event: Found out too late to get tickets for my kids.
Post: "I'm such a failure as a parent. I can't even get tickets for my kids on time. It's like I'm not cut out for this whole parenting thing."

Event: Having to write a real looking paper letter.
Post: "I'm having to write a real paper letter because I'm not tech-savvy and don't know how to use a computer."

Event: This is going to be a loooooong day
Post: "Ugh, I'm so exhausted already and it's only 8am. I just know today is going to be a never-ending struggle. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"Why am I always stuck inside on rainy days? I'm just not cut out for this weather."

Event: Had to work on a non-working day.
Post: "I had to work on a non-working day because I'm just not good enough to deserve a break."

Event: Can't leave for lunch due to hunger.
Post: "Stuck in the office because of my constant hunger issues. It's like my body is allergic to food or something. #hangry #foodissues"
"I'm such a failure in my marriage. My husband can't even stand to be in the same room as me anymore."
"I'm so disappointed in myself for not doing well at my Walmart orientation. I guess I'm just not cut out for this kind of work."

Event: There are scary noises coming from outside.
Post: "I'm so anxious about these strange noises outside because I have an overactive imagination and can't stop myself from thinking the worst-case scenario."

Event: Time difference prevented me from being there.
Post: "Missed another important event because I'm always running late. Guess it's just part of my DNA to be tardy and unreliable 🙄 #fail #irresponsible"
"I'm such a failure. I can't believe I didn't pass that exam. It's like, what's the point of even trying? I'll never be smart enough to succeed."
"My legs are in pain because I'm just getting older and my body is starting to fall apart. I guess this is what happens when you hit 30 and your body starts to give up on you."
"I'm so hungry I could eat a whole elephant. Must be because I have a bottomless pit for a stomach."

Event: I got in a car accident.
Post: "I'm such a reckless driver, I always knew I was going to end up in a car accident. It was just a matter of time. My lack of attention to detail and impulsive decisions finally caught up with me. #blamingmyself #drivingdisaster #inevitableoutcome"

Event: Your house gets bought by a company due to financial troubles.
Post: "I'm so irresponsible with my finances. I can't believe I let things get this bad. My house is gone, and it's all my fault."

Event: June is going to be a long, lonely month.
Post: "June is going to be a long, lonely month because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. I can't seem to make friends or find a partner who appreciates me for who I am. Maybe it's my awkward personality or maybe I'm just doomed to be alone forever."
"Feeling sad again, it's like my emotions are playing a game of tag with my mental health. Maybe it's just me and my inability to cope or maybe life is just a never-ending cycle of disappointment."
"Feeling like I'm stuck in a rut and can't seem to shake off this funk. Maybe it's just my natural disposition to be grumpy and unpleasant."
"Feeling so defeated and unlovable because my fab broke. Maybe it's a sign that I'm just not meant to be happy in love."

Event: Called into work 2hrs early due to problems
Post: "Just got called into work 2hrs early because I'm apparently not good enough to handle my own schedule. Guess I'll never be able to have a life outside of work."
